english.segment1: On a Sunday morning in the back row. Never thought I'd end up there. 'Cause I was running from You. Down a dead end road, I was just too scared
english.segment2: To ever let You in so deep. To think that You could rescue me

english.segment5: 'Cause You were there all along. Always chasing after me. I don't know why it took so long. For me to finally see
